title: Saysimple
description: Built interactive site elements including a configurable pricing calculator and a customizable chat widget generator to improve engagement.

modal.title: Saysimple
modal.description: Created interactive elements for Saysimple's website, including a pricing calculator based on configurable options, and a customizable chat widget generator. These tools enhance website functionality and offer practical solutions to boost client interaction and engagement.

challenges.title: Challenges & Solutions
challenges.description: Building flexible, configurable components that could be easily customized by clients while maintaining consistent functionality and performance across different website implementations.
